section.name: Mailing Lists
section.p: A mailing list is an electronic discussion forum that anyone can subscribe to. When someone sends an email message to the mailing list, a copy of that message is broadcast to everyone who is subscribed to that mailing list. Mailing lists provide a simple and effective communication mechanism.

ul.li: The DPML Support List is aimed towards facilitating and assiting product users of DPML solutions.
The DPML Development List is concerned with the overall development of the DPML product family.
The DPML Public Relations List is concerned with project promotion and relationships with sponsoring organizations.
The DPML Admin List is concerned with infrastructure and general administrative issues.
The DPML Notify List handles svn commit messages and other low-level notifications.
